name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: hadoop.security.group.mapping.ldap.num.attempts
description:
This property is the number of attempts to be made for LDAP operations.
    If this limit is exceeded, LdapGroupsMapping will return an empty
    group list.

name: fs.s3a.fast.upload.active.blocks
description:
Maximum Number of blocks a single output stream can have
    active (uploading, or queued to the central FileSystem
    instance's pool of queued operations.

    This stops a single stream overloading the shared thread pool.

name: dfs.datanode.transfer.socket.recv.buffer.size
description:
Socket receive buffer size for DataXceiver (receiving packets from client
    during block writing). This may affect TCP connection throughput.
    If it is set to zero or negative value, no buffer size will be set
    explicitly, thus enable tcp auto-tuning on some system.
    The default value is 0.

name: dfs.datanode.min.outlier.detection.nodes
description: Minimum number of nodes to run outlier detection.

name: ipc.client.connection.maxidletime
description:
The maximum time in msec after which a client will bring down the
               connection to the server.

name: dfs.ls.limit
description:
Limit the number of files printed by ls. If less or equal to
    zero, at most DFS_LIST_LIMIT_DEFAULT (= 1000) will be printed.

name: dfs.namenode.list.reencryption.status.num.responses
description:
When listing re-encryption status, the maximum number of zones
    that will be returned in a batch. Fetching the list incrementally in
    batches improves namenode performance.

name: dfs.client.max.block.acquire.failures
description: Maximum failures allowed when trying to get block information from a specific datanode.
